title: ID: Geometric Sans, some contrast
content:
Hi,  
Please could someone ID this typeface for me?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120612000740im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_sample_1_4943.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120612000740im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_sample_2_4887.jpg)

I saw it in NewWork Magazine, issue 1, which you can view here: [http://www.newworkmag.com/issue1.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120612000740/http:/www.newworkmag.com/issue1.html "http://www.newworkmag.com/issue1.html")  
 [http://www.newworkmag.com/issue2.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120612000740/http:/www.newworkmag.com/issue2.html "http://www.newworkmag.com/issue2.html")  
 [http://www.newworkmag.com/issue3.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120612000740/http:/www.newworkmag.com/issue3.html "http://www.newworkmag.com/issue3.html")

The samples were found in issue 1 about half-way through,  
and issue 2 towards the end.  
 [http://www.newworkmag.com/images/5\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120612000740/http:/www.newworkmag.com/images/5_1.jpg "http://www.newworkmag.com/images/5\_1.jpg")  
 [http://www.newworkmag.com/images2/7\_1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120612000740/http:/www.newworkmag.com/images2/7_1.jpg "http://www.newworkmag.com/images2/7\_1.jpg")

Cheers,  
Henry
author: manofscience
